alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 5:45PM EST until February 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations around a tenth of an inch possible, along with a dusting of sleet accumulation. * WHERE...In Indiana, Dubois, Crawford and Perry Counties. In Kentucky, Hancock and Ohio Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on a few slippery spots on roadways, especially bridges and overpasses. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice is most likely to accumulate on elevated surfaces such as trees and cars, and slick spots should mainly be confined to bridges, overpasses, and sheltered areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Indiana, for Indiana Road Conditions please visit http://pws.trafficwise.org In Kentucky, for Kentucky Road Conditions please visit http://goky.ky.gov
